casebody.data:
First Department,

November, 1954.

(November 3, 1954.) Jane Froman et al., Appellants, et al., Plaintiff, v. Pan American Airways, Inc., Respondent.

Judgment unanimously affirmed, with costs. No opinion. Present — Dore, J. P., Cohn, Breitel, Bastow and Botein, JJ.; Botein, J., taking no part. [See 285 App. Div. 806.]
